WELCOME-TITLE: A fast developing coin for web and real life payment
WELCOME-SUB-TITLE: VIG COIN is to be a decentralized, secure, private, proof-of-request, energy-saving, web-friendly cryptocurrency.
COURSE-6: 毕业实战项目(参与实际项目，并发布开源包)
ENROLLMENT-T1-DETAIL: An advanced cryptocurrency protocol, where monero is derived from. It is untraceable, private and secure.
ENROLLMENT-T2-DETAIL: VIG COIN is trying to adopt an energy saving consensus, Proof of Requests is where it will start from.
ENROLLMENT-T3-DETAIL: VIG COIN utilizes PoRs since PoW is energy-consuming. With PoRs node as a service is enabled fundamentally.
ENROLLMENT-T4-DETAIL: As all projects created by vigcoin are default to GPL, which makes them free software. They are created to contribute the software freedom of human beings.
WHAT-IS-THE-DIFFERENCE-INTRO: VIG COIN is a cryptocurrency that wants to drive cryptocurrency technology to be used world wide with mobile devices and computers. It is an innovative coin with an open mind to new technologies. It wants everyone to use cryptocurrency easily. It is created for everyone who cares wealth privacy and security.
MENTOR-INTRO-T1-INTRO: Based on CryptoNote, Build a new Coin with everything ready.
MENTOR-INTRO-T2-INTRO: Include code migration, refinery, Architecturing, api documentation.
MENTOR-INTRO-T3-INTRO: After api and architectural redesign, VIG will be capable in handling lightweight wallet requests.
MENTOR-INTRO-T4: 4. Node as a service for merchants
MENTOR-INTRO-T4-INTRO: After api and architectural redesign, VIG will be capable to implement a service for each node, where every wallet can request at. Merchants can own their profits by operating a service node for users from all over the world.
